document.full_text: french president nicolas sarkozy is backing bank of italy governor mario draghi to take over at the e.c.b. when current president jean-claude trichet steps down.
document.title: sarkozy backs draghi to take over e.c.b.
lines_and_colors: french president nicolas sarkozy is backing bank of italy governor mario draghi to take over at the e.c.b. when current president jean-claude trichet steps down.
